articles.title: The FAA is banning drones in parts of NJ after thousands of mystery sightings
articles.description: The FAA has issued a temporary drone ban covering 22 parts of New Jersey, including Jersey City, Elizabeth, and Camden.

articles.title: Scripting News: Thursday, December 19, 2024
articles.description: Dave Winer, OG blogger, podcaster, developed first apps in many categories. Old enough to know better. It's even worse than it appears.
